message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This Client Participation is already deleted.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PLAN_ITEM_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: The name of plan item must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_TYPE_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: The type of participation must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_DATE_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: The date of participation must be provided.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_TIME_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: The time of participation must be provided.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_HOURS_INVALID_VALUE
message.locale: The number of hours entered must be less or equal to 24.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_MINUTES_INVALID_VALUE
message.locale: The number of minutes entered must be less or equal to 59.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PARTICIPATIONS_FOR_TYPE_PLAN_ITEM_DATE_EXIST
message.locale: Participation in this plan item has already been recorded for this date. Please update this if you want to record additional time.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PARTICIPATION_DATE_PLAN_ITEM_STARTDATE
message.locale: The date specified is before the plan item started.This plan item did not start until %1d.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PARTICIPATION_DATE_PLAN_ITEM_ENDDATE
message.locale: The date specified is after the plan item ended.This plan item ended on %1d.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PARTICIPATION_PLAN_ITEM_STATUS
message.locale: You cannot record participation for this plan item until it has been started.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_ADD_MODIFY_PARTICIPATION_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: Client participation may not be recorded or modified as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_CANCEL_PARTICIPATION_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: Client participation may not be canceled as the service plan has already been closed.
Client participation may not be cancelled as the service plan has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_MODIFY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This client participation is deleted and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_PARTICIPATION_PLAN_ITEM_USER_SENSITIVITY_LEVEL
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_PLANPARTICIPANT_USER_SENSITIVITY_LEVEL
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_PLANNEDITEM_LIST_IS_EMPTY
message.locale: A client must be responsible for at least one plan item with a status of In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_PLAN_ITEM_NOT_STARTED
message.locale: Client participation cannot be recorded for a plan item with a status other than In Progress or Completed.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_VIEW_OPERATION_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_MAINTAIN_OPERATION_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_ADD_PLAN_ITEM_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to add client participation for the selected plan item.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_VIEW_PLAN_ITEM_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view these client participation details.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_MODIFY_PLAN_ITEM_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to modify client participation for the selected plan item.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_DELETE_PLAN_ITEM_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to delete client participation for the selected plan item.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this page.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_FROM_DATE_IS_NOT_MONDAY
message.locale: The From Date specified should be Monday.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_FV_TO_DATE_IS_NOT_SUNDAY
message.locale: The To Date specified should be Sunday.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_READ_PARTICIPANT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this service plan.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_XRV_PLANNED_ITEM_RESPONSIBILITYTYPE
message.locale: You can record/update Client Participation only if plan item is under client responsibility.

message.name: ERR_MAX_NUM_HOURS_IN_A_DAY_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The total participation for a day cannot exceed 24 hours.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_RV_INVALID_PLAN_ITEM_TYPE
message.locale: Absence Details will only be available for plan items of type '%1s' or '%2s'.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_RV_CANNOT_DELETE_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORDS
message.locale: This absence record cannot be deleted because it was created automatically by the system based upon information submitted in attendance tracking.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORDS
message.locale: This absence record cannot be modified because it was created automatically by the system based upon information submitted in attendance tracking.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_XRV_ABSENCE_PERIOD_OVERLAPS
message.locale: Period Start Date and Period End date for an Absence Details record created manually by a user cannot overlap with the Period Start Date and Period End Date of an existing record created manually by a user that has the same Absence Reason.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_FV_PERIOD_START_DATE_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: Absence Period Start Date must be provided.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_FV_PERIOD_END_DATE_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: Absence Period End Date must be provided.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_FV_UNITS_UNATTENDED_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: Absence Period Units Not Attended must be provided.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCE_FV_ABSENCE_REASON_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: Absence Reason must be provided.

message.name: ERR_CLIENTPARTICIPATION_RV_CANNOT_DELETE_SYSTEM_CREATED_RECORDS
message.locale: Client participation cannot be deleted as it was automatically created by the system.
